title: 似乎卡BUG了！想Ban了一样这ID进不去了！40悬赏！
author: q597146348
txt_content: http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-290230-1-1.html参考这里！情况差不多！！就是一直显示a fatal error has occurred, this connection is terminated你点进去服务器就闪了一下就显示a fatal error has occurred, this connection is terminated了！求解决方案！{:10_527:}

replies.author: 北美路人
replies.txt_content:
mod 崩溃或丢失
你手里拿着一个id为 455 的东西来自 [] mod
mod已丢失。
唯一的解决方案是清空inventory，代价是所有玩家背包清空。

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
去修改.\plugins\Essentials\userdata\玩家ID.yml
